questions.question: What is the key difference between reactive and deliberative agent architectures?

options.text: Reactive agents plan ahead while deliberative agents respond immediately
Reactive agents respond immediately to stimuli while deliberative agents plan and reason
There is no difference between the two approaches
Reactive agents are always faster than deliberative agents

questions.explanation: Reactive agents provide immediate responses to environmental stimuli, while deliberative agents engage in planning and reasoning before taking action.
